questions.question: Find the greatest common factor (GCF) and least common multiple (LCM) for each pair of numbers. 1. 6 and 96
questions.question_description: Find the GCF and LCM of 6 and 96.
questions.answer_description: The greatest common factor of 6 and 96 is 6.

questions.question: Find the greatest common factor (GCF) and least common multiple (LCM) for each pair of numbers. LCM =
questions.answer_description: The least common multiple of 6 and 96 is 96.
